ComicInfo.Series: Tarot: Witch of the Black Rose
ComicInfo.Summary:
The Skeleton Man takes Tarot, Raven Hex, and the Saber toothed Boo Cat and Pooka on a quest for fire in this light hearted tale of adventure. Dinosaurs, tar pits, and volcanoes are not the only things making their trek difficult. Will they survive in the past or will they be history?
